ygData.subject: RE: Genni quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Preach on Brother Crier. When I have some absurd amount of silver on me, I announce my loc, and that the first person who meets me can get the cash. After
ygData.messageBody:
> through "The Depression" of growing up dirt poor. I still grimace at
> destroying several hundred silver at a whack - that's a hell of a lot of Rat
> Whiskers and Fire Beetle Eyes.

Preach on Brother Crier.

When I have some absurd amount of silver on me, I announce
my loc, and that the first person who meets me can get the cash.
After a few minutes I destroy it. I gave some dude over 1400
silver last night. He asked me why I was giving away money,
and then he tried to move. hehe.

Harmonic.
